pkgmetadata.longdescription: (Semi)Parametric Estimation and Bootstrapping of INAR Models // Semiparametric and parametric estimation of INAR models including a finite sample refinement (Faymonville et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s10260-022-00655-0) for the semiparametric setting introduced in Drost et al. (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2008.00687.x, different procedures to bootstrap INAR data (Jentsch, C. and Wei, C.H. (2017) doi:10.3150/18-BEJ1057) and flexible simulation of INAR data.
